choose.otherwise: AND CATE_SEQ = ( SELECT TOP 1 A.SEQ FROM CO_FAQCategory A ORDER BY A.SEQ ASC )

mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(A.seq) FROM CO_Notice A WHERE 1 = 1

SELECT TOP ${cntPerPage} A.seq, A.title, A.notice_yn, A.atch_file_id, A.creation_user, A.creation_date, B.STRE_FILE_NM FROM CO_Notice A LEFT OUTER JOIN CO_ComfileDetail B ON B.atch_file_id = A.atch_file_id WHERE 1 = 1
AND A.seq NOT IN( SELECT TOP ${startNum} B.seq FROM CO_Notice B WHERE 1=1
ORDER BY B.NOTICE_YN DESC, B.creation_date DESC )
ORDER BY A.NOTICE_YN DESC, A.creation_date desc
SELECT COUNT(A.seq) FROM CO_Inquiry A LEFT OUTER JOIN CO_Member B ON B.MEMBER_NO = A.creation_user WHERE 1 = 1

SELECT TOP ${cntPerPage} A.seq, A.title, A.inq_yn, B.MEMBER_MAIL_ADDR, A.creation_date FROM CO_Inquiry A LEFT OUTER JOIN CO_Member B ON B.MEMBER_NO = A.creation_user WHERE 1 = 1
AND A.seq NOT IN( SELECT TOP ${startNum} B.seq FROM CO_Inquiry B WHERE 1=1
ORDER BY B.creation_date DESC )
ORDER BY A.creation_date desc
SELECT COUNT(A.seq) FROM CO_FAQNotice A WHERE 1 = 1

SELECT TOP ${cntPerPage} ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY A.SEQ ASC) AS ROWNUM, A.SEQ, A.CATE_SEQ, A.INQUIRY_CONTENTS, A.ANSWER_CONTENTS, A.creation_user, A.creation_date, B.CATE_NAME FROM CO_FAQNotice A LEFT OUTER JOIN CO_FAQCategory B ON B.SEQ = A.CATE_SEQ WHERE 1 = 1
AND A.seq NOT IN( SELECT TOP ${startNum} B.seq FROM CO_FAQNotice B WHERE 1=1
ORDER BY B.creation_date DESC )
ORDER BY A.creation_date DESC, ROWNUM DESC
SELECT A.SEQ, A.CATE_NAME, A.CREATION_USER, A.CREATION_DATE FROM CO_FAQCategory A WHERE 1 = 1
SELECT TOP 6 A.SEQ, A.TITLE, A.NOTICE_YN, A.CREATION_DATE FROM CO_Notice A WHERE 1 = 1 ORDER BY A.NOTICE_YN DESC, A.CREATION_DATE DESC
SELECT TOP 6 A.SEQ, A.INQUIRY_CONTENTS, A.CREATION_DATE FROM CO_FAQNotice A WHERE 1 = 1 ORDER BY A.CREATION_DATE DESC
SELECT COUNT(A.seq) FROM TB_PUSH_MSG A WHERE 1 = 1

SELECT A.seq, A.title, A.message, A.reserve_time, A.atch_file_id, A.push_flag, A.contents_flag, A.push_url, A.reg_date, I.file_stre_cours, I.stre_file_nm, I.orignl_file_nm FROM TB_PUSH_MSG A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_COMFILE B ON B.atch_file_id = A.atch_file_id LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_COMFILEDETAIL I ON I.atch_file_id = A.atch_file_id AND I.file_sn = 0 WHERE 1 = 1
ORDER BY reg_date desc LIMIT #{startNum}, #{endNum}

SELECT A.seq, A.title, A.contents, A.atch_file_id, A.notice_yn, A.creation_user, A.creation_date, B.FILE_SN, B.FILE_STRE_COURS, B.ORIGNL_FILE_NM, B.FILE_EXTSN, round(convert(float,B.FILE_SIZE)/1024, 2) as FILE_SIZE FROM CO_Notice A LEFT OUTER JOIN CO_ComfileDetail B ON B.atch_file_id = A.atch_file_id WHERE A.seq = #{noticeId}

SELECT A.seq, B.seq AS answerSeq, A.title, A.contents as userContent, A.INQ_YN, C.MEMBER_MAIL_ADDR, A.creation_date, B.CONTENTS FROM CO_Inquiry A LEFT OUTER JOIN CO_InquiryAnswer B ON B.inq_seq = A.seq LEFT OUTER JOIN CO_Member C ON C.MEMBER_NO = A.creation_user WHERE A.seq = #{seq}
SELECT A.seq, A.CATE_SEQ, A.INQUIRY_CONTENTS, A.ANSWER_CONTENTS FROM CO_FAQNotice A WHERE A.seq = #{faqId}
SELECT A.seq, A.title, A.message, A.reserve_time, A.atch_file_id, A.push_flag, A.contents_flag, A.push_url, A.reg_date FROM TB_PUSH_MSG A WHERE A.seq = #{seq}

SELECT TOP 1 p.seq ,p.title ,p.rownum FROM ( SELECT aa.* FROM (SELECT row_number() over (ORDER BY a.NOTICE_YN, a.creation_date) AS rownum, a.* FROM CO_Notice a WHERE 1 = 1 ) aa WHERE aa.rownum > #{rownum} )p ORDER BY p.rownum

SELECT TOP 1 n.seq ,n.title ,n.rownum FROM ( SELECT aa.* FROM (SELECT row_number() over (ORDER BY a.NOTICE_YN, a.creation_date) AS rownum, a.* FROM CO_Notice a WHERE 1 = 1 ) aa WHERE aa.rownum < #{rownum} )n ORDER BY n.rownum desc

SELECT A.seq , A.title , A.message , A.reserve_time , A.atch_file_id , A.push_flag , A.contents_flag , A.push_url , A.reg_date , CONCAT(B.file_stre_cours, B.stre_file_nm) as img_url , DATE_FORMAT(A.reserve_time, '%Y%m%d%H%i') as dateTest , DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y%m%d%H%i') as dateTest2 FROM TB_PUSH_MSG A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_COMFILEDETAIL B ON A.atch_file_id = B.atch_file_id WHERE 1 = 1 AND DATE_FORMAT(A.reserve_time, '%Y%m%d%H%i') = DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y%m%d%H%i') ORDER BY A.reg_date LIMIT 1

SELECT A.seq ,A.push_token ,A.dev_type ,A.push_yn ,A.reg_date FROM TB_DEVICE_INFO A WHERE A.push_yn = 'Y'
ORDER BY A.reg_date DESC
SELECT TOP 1 CHARGE_PER FROM CH_Charge ORDER BY CREATION_DATE DESC
